short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display the beautiful names of Allah with meanings in English and Urdu

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover the beauty and wisdom of the 99 Names of Allah with this Chrome extension. Each name is paired with its English and Urdu meanings to help you deepen your understanding of these divine attributes. Whether you're looking for spiritual inspiration, educational tools, or a quick reference, this extension brings the sacred Names right to your fingertips. Easy to use and free, it’s perfect for those who want to incorporate Islamic teachings into their daily browsing experience.
Features:
•	99 names of Allah with English and Urdu translations.
•	Quick and accessible reference.
•	Lightweight, user-friendly interface.
•	Perfect for personal spiritual growth.
•	Completely free and ad-free.
